James Winstone (9 Febụwarị 1863 - 27 Julaị 1921) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka ndị ọrụ
A mụrụ ya na Risca, Winstone rụrụ ọrụ site na afọ asatọ, nke mbụ na mpaghara brickworks , mgbe ahụ na Risca United Colliery
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-enyocha ihe, ma soro William Brace rụọ ọrụ iji mee mkpọsa megide ọnụ ọgụgụ ịkwụ ụgwọ
N'ihi ya, ọ bụ onye ama ama guzobere South Wales Miners 'Federation (SWMF) n'afọ 1898.

Winstone nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Independent Labour Party, ma bụrụ onye nkwusa Baptist.  A họpụtara ya maka Labour Party na Risca Urban District Council, mgbe ahụ na Abersychan council, nke ọ bụ onye isi oche n'afọ 1911

N'afọ 1907, a họpụtara ya na Monmouthshire County Council.  O guzoro na Monmouth Boroughs na ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke afọ 1906, mana enwetaghị nkwado site n'aka ndị otu ya, a họpụtaghịkwa ya.  N'afọ 1912, a họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke SWMF, onye mbụ na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ọkwa dị otú ahụ.  A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa ndị ọrụ maka ntuli aka Merthyr Tydfil nke afọ 1915, oche ahụ bụ Keir Hardie nweburu, mana Charles Butt Stanton nke British Workers League meriri ya, onye gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndị na-egwupụta ihe iji soro nkwado Conservative na Liberal na-akwado agha na-akwado ndị ọrụ onwe ya.  Na 1915, ọ nọchiri Brace dị ka onye isi otu, na-eje ozi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
O guzokwa na Merthyr na ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke afọ 1918, mana o nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma ọzọ
N'afọ 1920, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Monmouthshire County Council.
